articles.title: Deadly bat fungus confirmed in five Northern California counties - San Francisco Chronicle
articles.description: The fungus behind white-nose syndrome, which has killed millions of bats across North America, has been detected in several Northern California counties.
articles.content:
The fungus responsible for white-nose syndrome, a disease that has devastated bat colonies across North America, has been detected in several counties in Northern California.
